text: This is a list of U.S. states sorted by their gross state product (GSP). GSP is similar to a country's gross domestic product (GDP). This is an overall measure of the states economy. The United States Bureau of Economic Analysis is responsible for finding this number each year. == List == Map of U.S.states by nominal GDP in billions USD: >$1 trillion $100 bil. - $1 tril. <$100
